byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: 3 Brit planes on way to Helgoland Bight battle with 12 German; Brit repts 2, German, 3, Brit planes lost
snippet: LONDON, Jan. 2--Three British bombers heading for the German naval base in Helgoland Bight were attacked today by twelve of Germany's Messerschmitt "air destroyers" well out over the North Sea. Only one of the British planes [of the Vickers Wellin...

headline.main: NAZIS SHOOT DOWN 2 BRITISH BOMBERS; Three Raiders Engaged by 12 Messerschmitts on Way to Helgoland Navy Base ONE GERMAN PLANE BURNS Two Others Believed Lost-- Berlin Reports All Three Enemy Craft 'Destroyed'

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 2--Three British bombers heading for the German naval base in Helgoland Bight were attacked today by twelve of Germany's Messerschmitt "air destroyers" well out over the North Sea. Only one of the British planes [of the Vickers Wellington type, according to Berlin] managed to get back.
